snippet: The re-election of President Obama did not presage an end to the deregulated fund-raising unleashed by Citizens United; it most likely reinforced it.
abstract: Political Memo; outcome of 2012 elections is likely to reinforce growth of unlimited fund-raising and surge of outside groups moving into political mainstream, despite fact that wealthy donors who poured several hundred million dollars into defeating Pres Obama were unsuccessful.
lead_paragraph: The re-election of President Obama did not presage an end to the deregulated fund-raising unleashed by Citizens United; it most likely reinforced it.

headline.seo: A Vote for Unlimited Campaign Financing
headline.main: Result Won’t Limit Campaign Money Any More Than Ruling Did
headline.print_headline: Result Won’t Limit Campaign Money Any More Than Ruling Did
